td.content: s:white male lecturer aged 25 Ys presents with mild weakness of 3 weeks duration together with mild decreased appetite, mild very irritable. he smokes 1 pack a day he is a heavy drinker o:Height 71 in, Weight 133 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Leukemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed cytarabine - 100 mg/m2/day IV infusion, methotrexate - 1200 mg/m2 IV infusion, hydrocortisone - 8 mg/kg IV infusion, and ordered CBC.

td.content: s:pt presents with 9 days history of Kidney. patient is a 25 yo white m lecturer. o:Height 71 in, Weight 132 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Pyelonephritis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urine culture.

s:pt presents with 5 days history of worsening mild very irritable, mild decreased appetite and mild weakness. pt is a 26 year old white M. o:Height 70 in, Weight 132 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 65, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 16, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Leukemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed cytarabine - 100 mg/m2/day IV infusion, methotrexate - 1200 mg/m2 IV infusion, hydrocortisone - 8 mg/kg IV infusion, and ordered CBC.

td.content: s:26 yr old white male presents with Kidney x 2 weeks. he has smoked one pack of cigarettes for last 4 years consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily o:Height 72 in, Weight 136 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 66, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 18 a:Pyelonephritis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urine culture.
